com.orm.sqlite
Interface IBaseDataAccess<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDataAccess, ExampleDataAccess
public interface IBaseDataAccess<T>

Every data access interface should extend this interface and this library use should be through the interfaces only

Author:
Noam
